meanings.sent1: She enjoys beladying her room with colorful curtains.
meanings.sent2: The artist spent hours beladying the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was beladying her dollhouse with tiny flowers.
meanings.sent4: The sunset beladied the sky with hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The garden was beladied with blooming flowers, creating a picturesque scene.

meanings.sent1: He decided to belady the gift box with a shiny ribbon.
meanings.sent2: The Christmas tree was beladied with sparkling ornaments.
meanings.sent3: The chef beladied the cake with intricate frosting designs.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was beladied with elegant lace patterns.
meanings.sent5: The room was beladied with fairy lights, giving it a magical feel.

meanings.definition: To enhance the appearance of something
meanings.sent1: Adding a fresh coat of paint can belady an old fence.
meanings.sent2: The new furniture beladied the living room, making it more inviting.
meanings.sent3: The necklace beladied her outfit, completing the look.
meanings.sent4: The music beladied the atmosphere of the party, making it lively.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight beladied the garden, highlighting its beauty.
